title: Smart Scan - Motorcycle Model and Market Variant Confirmation

body.body: Smart Scan - Motorcycle Model and Market Variant Confirmation
When the initial scan is complete, the details of the detected motorcycle are displayed.
If the scan is unable to obtain enough data from the motorcycle to identify the specific model and market variant, the
If the scan successfully identifies the model and market variant, The
If the scan is unable to identify a specific model and market variant, a list of possible model options is displayed based on data that can be retrieved from the motorcycle.
Each model option description contains the following information:
Model Name - Applicable Market Variant Codes - Additional Model Variant Information (where applicable) - VIN Range
A guide to the market variant codes is provided below. See
Smart Scan - Motorcycle Model and Market Variant Confirmation
Select the correct model and market variant for your region, then click
The diagnostic tool will progress to the
If the scan successfully identifies the model and market variant, the tool will progress directly to the model confirmation screen.
The Model Confirmation Screen will display:
A list of applicable Market Variant Codes
A guide to the regions covered by the list of market variant codes.
Always ensure that the correct motorcycle model name is displayed on the model confirmation screen before clicking CONFIRM.

Continuing with an incorrect model selected will result in an incorrect software and calibration assessment of your motorcycle. This can lead to incorrect calibrations being downloaded to the motorcycle, which in turn could cause an unsafe riding condition.
An unsafe riding condition could lead to an accident resulting in injury or death.
Always ensure that the correct motorcycle market variant is displayed on the model confirmation screen before clicking CONFIRM.

Continuing with an incorrect market variant selected can lead to an incorrect software and calibration assessment of your motorcycle. This can lead to incorrect regional calibrations being downloaded to the motorcycle.
Downloading calibrations for an incorrect market variant may cause motorcycle electrical or electronic systems to function incorrectly for your region.
Check the model name and market variant are correct for the connected motorcycle, then click
After clicking confirm, the Model Status Summary Page is displayed. See
Alternatively, If the model or market variant is not correct, click the
button to return to the Select Model screen and select an alternative.
Belgium; France; Germany; Italy; Netherlands; Spain; Sweden; Switzerland
Czech Republic; Greece; Hungary; Israel; Philippines; Poland; Russia; Turkey; Vietnam
